
=head1 NAME

organization_type_map

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 organization (character varying) - 
 organization_type (character varying) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                 Table "gcis_metadata.organization_type_map"
       Column       |       Type        | Modifiers | Storage  | Description 
 -------------------+-------------------+-----------+----------+-------------
  organization      | character varying | not null  | extended | 
  organization_type | character varying | not null  | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "organization_type_map_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (organization, organization_type)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "organization_type_map_organization_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (organization) REFERENCES organization(identifier) ON DELETE CASCADE
     "organization_type_map_organization_type_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (organization_type) REFERENCES organization_type(identifier) ON DELETE CASCADE
 Triggers:
     audit_trigger_row AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON organization_type_map FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
     audit_trigger_stm AFTER TRUNCATE ON organization_type_map FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
